content.question: During the Great Depression, “Hoovervilles” were

choices.label: government relocation camps for indigent workers
model communities established by the Hoover administration
shantytowns of unemployed and homeless people
soup kitchens financed under New Deal legislation
work projects established by the Hoover administration to revitalize the economy

content.answer: shantytowns of unemployed and homeless people

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
